code: export var apiUrl='https://todoo.5xcamp.us';export var Api_signIn="".concat(apiUrl,"/users/sign_in");export var Api_register="".concat(apiUrl,"/users");export var Api_Todo="".concat(apiUrl,"/todos");export var setUserData=function setUserData(data){return localStorage.setItem('user',JSON.stringify(data));};export var getUserData=function getUserData(){return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user'));};export var getAuthToken=function getAuthToken(){return getUserData().authorization;};export var clearUserData=function clearUserData(){return localStorage.clear();};
